html:
International Relations

This course will introduce you to key concepts, theories and methodological approaches in international relations (IR). It will help you to think about international events by using an array of theoretical ’tools‘ to assess the behaviour of international actors.

Learning Objectives:

+  Identify and explain important concepts and theories in IR

+  Connect these concepts and theories to key issues in regional and global international orders

+  Discuss major world events in the news

+  Analyse world events from a number of theoretical perspectives.

Module Content:
